Name: require_worker_skill_match
Description: Only assign workers who have required skills for the task

Name: enforce_sprint_capacity_limit
Description: Ensure total effort in Sprint Backlog does not exceed team capacity

Name: require_product_owner_approval
Description: Only Product Backlog items approved by Product Owner can be scheduled

Name: enforce_sprint_duration
Description: Sprint must last exactly 2 weeks (14 days)

Name: require_unique_sprint_goals
Description: Each sprint must have a clearly defined and unique goal

Name: limit_worker_assignments
Description: No worker should be assigned to more than 3 tasks per sprint

Name: require_blocker_resolution
Description: All high-severity blockers must be resolved within 48 hours

Name: enforce_backlog_order
Description: Higher priority items must be selected before lower ones in sprint planning

Name: require_daily_scrum_attendance
Description: All team members must attend at least 90% of Daily Scrums

Name: require_retrospective_action_closure
Description: At least 70% of improvement actions must be completed before next sprint

Name: limit_feature_overlap
Description: No feature should be included in more than one release

Name: require_epic_decomposition
Description: All epics must be broken into at least one user story before sprint inclusion
